title.rendered: Disclosure of large shareholding in Aqualis ASA

content.rendered: Glen Ole Rødland, Chairman of Aqualis ASA, has Received proxies Representing 13,854,418 shares, Corresponding 2:32% of the company, for the upcoming annual general meeting in Aqualis ASA on 22 May 2015.
